sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ Common Use Cases
sections.description: Here are some of the most popular use cases for JavaScript:
content: 1. Web Development: Enhancing interactivity in websites using DOM manipulation, form validation, and dynamic content updates.
2. Mobile App Development: Building cross-platform mobile apps using frameworks like React Native.
3. Server-side Development: Handling backend logic using Node.js.
4. Game Development: Creating browser-based games using libraries like Phaser.js.
5. Desktop Applications: Developing cross-platform apps using Electron.
6. Real-Time Applications: Enabling real-time features like chat, live notifications using WebSockets and Socket.io.
